release.info: Changed visual style for note items in list.
Decreased size of the text in note title in list.
release.new: Added "trash" (with recovery) for the deleted notes.
Added swipes for delete (and restore from "trash") notes.
Added displaying info text on center of screen when note list is empty.
Added displaying "what's new" at first run of the new QNotez version.
Added displaying full changelog in the info screen.
release.bugfix: Small bugfixes on the note add/edit scrrens.

release.new: Added the ability to save an editable note by pressing the back button.
Ability for add, edit, delete and quick search functionality.
